definition: Aspergillus flavus (fungus typically found on crops)

pinyin: zu3 zhi1 jiang1 mei2 jun1 bing4

sentences.english: When necessary in these parts take discharge for mould anti-bma or training.
sentences.chinese: 必要时要在这些部位取分泌物作霉菌镜检或培养。

sentences.english: Objective To study the relationship of newborn eczema and mold infection.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨霉菌感染与新生儿红臀的关系。

sentences.english: Three patients were died among which 2 were died of mycotic septicemia and 1 cardiac failure.
sentences.chinese: 合并霉菌性败血症2例，合并心功能衰竭1例。

sentences.english: The definite diagnosis of primary cutaneous cryptococcosis was confirmed by pathologic findings and fungus cultures.
sentences.chinese: 确切的诊断乃是基于病理诊断及霉菌培养。

sentences.english: Seen here are branching hyphae of Aspergillus invading a cerebral vessel.
sentences.chinese: 图示曲霉菌的分枝状菌丝正侵入脑血管。

sentences.english: With typical clinical manifestations and mould positive, should be timely treatment.
sentences.chinese: 对有典型临床表现及霉菌阳性者，应及时治疗。

sentences.english: A study of the fermentative production of lycopene by Blakeslea trispora is reported.
sentences.chinese: 研究了应用三孢布拉氏霉菌生产番茄红素的发酵工艺。

sentences.english: Result Both mutanolysin and lysozyme could successfully lyse the wall of bifidobacterium and extract the plasmid from Bifidobacterium.
sentences.chinese: 结果球孢链霉菌发酵液与溶菌酶均成功提取到质粒。

sentences.english: The product can prevent mould from growing. They have excellent performance of acid-resisting and alkali-resisting.
sentences.chinese: 它们能防止霉菌生长，而且耐酸抗碱，性能优越。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the CT diagnostic value and CT findings of fungal sinusitis .
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨霉菌性鼻窦炎CT特征性表现及诊断价值。

sentences.english: Objective To discuss the representation and value of CT examination of mycosis of sinus.
sentences.chinese: 探讨霉菌性鼻窦炎的CT表现和价值。

sentences.english: Pathogenic identification of a new banana disease caused by Phytophthora sp.
sentences.chinese: 一种疫霉菌引起的香蕉新病害的病原初步鉴定。

sentences.english: What are mycotoxin controls or country of origin if exempt of flour for noodles?
sentences.chinese: 如果忽略面条面粉的原产地，如何控制霉菌毒素？

sentences.english: Objective To build a rat fungal keratitis model of Aspergillus Fumigutus.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立大鼠烟曲霉菌性角膜炎的动物模型。

sentences.english: The diseased chicken should be immediately separated and sterilized, and fed with nystatin.
sentences.chinese: 发病鸡则应立即隔离消毒，喂服制霉菌素。

sentences.english: Rhizoxin can stop root cells from multiplying.
sentences.chinese: 根霉菌素能够停止根部细胞繁殖。

definition: vaginal infection/inflammation of the vulva or vagina/colpitis
Aspergillus flavus (fungus typically found on crops)
gonococcus/Neisseria gonorrhoeae, the pathogen causing gonorrhea
